636710.name: The Sexy Brutale OST
636710.description:
All the guests are being murdered — horribly! — at this extravagant masquerade party set all across the sprawling and bizarre Sexy Brutale casino mansion.
And how a party would work without and exceptional soundtrack? It wouldn't.
Enjoy your stay... but do not overstay.

01 The Sexy Brutale Theme
02 Dressed in Red (The Bloody Girl's Theme)
03 A Clockwork Killing (Sixpence's Theme)
04 What's Your Poison? (The Bar)
05 Fire and Brimstone (The Masks)
06 Tequila at Noon
07 Carousel Macabre (Grinmaw's Theme)
08 Blood and Bone Waltz (Willow's Theme)
09 Shattered Hope (Tequila's Theme)
10 The Theatre Brutale
11 Tonight's Big Show! (Greyson's Death)
12 Life and Soul
13 Lonely Halls (The Library)
14 Heaven and Hell
15 Below Consciousness (The Basement)
16 Red Rain (The King)
17 The Gold Skull
18 The Fall
19 One Look (For Eleanor)
20 Broken (Lucas' Song — Piano)
21 Never To Be (Eleanor's Theme)
22 Old Habits
23 Tomorrow
636710.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语
